methods.name: AddGraphInputNode
methods.doc:
Adds a graph input node with the given name, DataType, and sets the graph input to default value.
Returns the new input node's output handle if it was successfully created, or an invalid handle if it failed.

methods.name: AddGraphOutputNode
methods.doc:
Adds a graph output node with the given name, DataType, and sets output node's input to default value.
Returns the new output node's input handle if it was successfully created, or an invalid handle if it failed.

methods.name: AddInterface
methods.doc: Adds an interface registered with the given name to the graph, adding associated input and output nodes.

methods.name: AddNodeByClassName
methods.doc:
Adds node referencing the highest native class version of the given class name to the document.
Returns a node handle to the created node if successful, or an invalid handle if it failed.

methods.name: ConnectNodeInputsToMatchingGraphInterfaceInputs
methods.doc: Connects a given node's inputs to all graph inputs for shared interfaces implemented on both the node's referenced class and the builder's MetaSound graph. Returns outputs of connected input nodes.

methods.name: ConnectNodeInputToGraphInput
methods.doc: Connects a given node input to the graph input with the given name.

methods.name: ConnectNodeOutputsToMatchingGraphInterfaceOutputs
methods.doc: Connects a given node's outputs to all graph outputs for shared interfaces implemented on both the node's referenced class and the builder's MetaSound graph. Returns inputs of connected output nodes.

methods.name: ConnectNodeOutputToGraphOutput
methods.doc: Connects a given node output to the graph output with the given name.

methods.name: ConnectNodes
methods.doc:
Connects node output to a node input. Does *NOT* provide loop detection for performance reasons.  Loop detection is checked on class registration when built or played.
Returns succeeded if connection made, failed if connection already exists with input, the data types do not match, or the connection is not supported due to access type
incompatibility (ex. constructor input to non-constructor input).

methods.name: ConnectNodesByInterfaceBindings
methods.doc: Connects two nodes using defined MetaSound Interface Bindings registered with the MetaSound Interface registry.

methods.name: ContainsNode
methods.doc: Returns whether node exists.

methods.name: ContainsNodeInput
methods.doc: Returns whether node input exists.

methods.name: ContainsNodeOutput
methods.doc: Returns whether node output exists.

methods.name: ConvertFromPreset
methods.doc: Converts this preset to a fully accessible MetaSound; sets result to succeeded if it was converted successfully and failed if it was not.

methods.name: DisconnectNodeInput
methods.doc: Removes connection to a given node input. Returns success if connection was removed, failed if not.

methods.name: DisconnectNodeOutput
methods.doc: Removes all connections from a given node output. Returns success if all connections were removed, failed if not.

methods.name: DisconnectNodes
methods.doc: Disconnects node output to a node input. Returns success if connection was removed, failed if not.

methods.name: DisconnectNodesByInterfaceBindings
methods.doc:
Disconnects two nodes using defined MetaSound Interface Bindings registered with the MetaSound Interface registry. Returns success if
all connections were found and removed, failed if any connections were not.

methods.name: FindGraphInputNode
methods.doc: Returns graph input node by the given name if it exists, or an invalid handle if not found.

methods.name: FindGraphOutputNode
methods.doc: Returns graph output node by the given name if it exists, or an invalid handle if not found.

methods.name: FindInterfaceInputNodes
methods.doc: Returns input nodes associated with a given interface.

methods.name: FindInterfaceOutputNodes
methods.doc: Returns output nodes associated with a given interface.

methods.name: FindNodeClassVersion
methods.doc: Returns output's parent node if the input is valid, otherwise returns invalid node handle.

methods.name: FindNodeInputByName
methods.doc: Returns node input by the given name if it exists, or an invalid handle if not found.

methods.name: FindNodeInputParent
methods.doc: Returns input's parent node if the input is valid, otherwise returns invalid node handle.

methods.name: FindNodeInputs
methods.doc: Returns all node inputs.

methods.name: FindNodeInputsByDataType
methods.doc: Returns node inputs by the given DataType (ex. "Audio", "Trigger", "String", "Bool", "Float", "Int32", etc.).

methods.name: FindNodeOutputByName
methods.doc: Returns node output by the given name.

methods.name: FindNodeOutputParent
methods.doc: Returns output's parent node if the input is valid, otherwise returns invalid node handle.

methods.name: FindNodeOutputs
methods.doc: Returns all node outputs.

methods.name: FindNodeOutputsByDataType
methods.doc: Returns node outputs by the given DataType (ex. "Audio", "Trigger", "String", "Bool", "Float", "Int32", etc.).

methods.name: GetNodeInputClassDefault
methods.doc: Returns node input's class literal value if set, otherwise fails and returns default literal.

methods.name: GetNodeInputData
methods.doc: Returns node input's data if valid (including things like name and datatype).

methods.name: GetNodeInputDefault
methods.doc: Returns node input's literal value if set on graph, otherwise fails and returns default literal.

methods.name: GetNodeInputIsConstructorPin
methods.doc: Returns whether the given node input is a constructor pin

methods.name: GetNodeOutputData
methods.doc: Returns node output's data if valid (including things like name and datatype).

methods.name: GetNodeOutputIsConstructorPin
methods.doc: Returns whether the given node output is a constructor pin

methods.name: GetReferencedPresetAsset
methods.doc: Return the asset referenced by this preset builder. Returns nullptr if the builder is not a preset.

methods.name: InterfaceIsDeclared
methods.doc: Returns if a given interface is declared.

methods.name: IsPreset
methods.doc: Returns whether this is a preset.

methods.name: NodeInputIsConnected
methods.doc: Returns if a given node input has connections.

methods.name: NodeOutputIsConnected
methods.doc: Returns if a given node output is connected.

methods.name: NodesAreConnected
methods.doc: Returns if a given node output and node input are connected.

methods.name: RemoveGraphInput
methods.doc: Removes graph input if it exists; sets result to succeeded if it was removed and failed if it was not.

methods.name: RemoveGraphOutput
methods.doc: Removes graph output if it exists; sets result to succeeded if it was removed and failed if it was not.

methods.name: RemoveInterface
methods.doc:
Removes the interface with the given name from the builder's MetaSound. Removes any graph inputs
and outputs associated with the given interface and their respective connections (if any).

methods.name: RemoveNode
methods.doc: Removes node and any associated connections from the builder's MetaSound.

methods.name: RemoveNodeInputDefault
methods.doc:
Removes node input literal default if set, reverting the value to be whatever the node class defaults the value to.
Returns success if value was removed, false if not removed (i.e. wasn't set to begin with).

methods.name: SetGraphInputDefault
methods.doc: Sets the input node's default value, overriding the default provided by the referenced graph if the graph is a preset.

methods.name: SetNodeInputDefault
methods.doc: Sets the node's input default value (used if no connection to the given node input is present)
